thread.title: The Damaging Shortcuts Entrepreneurs Take When Raising Money

author: Ed Zimmerman
title: The Damaging Shortcuts Entrepreneurs Take When Raising Money
text: Ed Zimmerman is co-founder and chair of the tech group at Lowenstein Sandler LLP and of @VentureCrush. He is also an adjunct professor teaching venture capital at Columbia Business School. It will come as no surprise that startup founders spend substantial time raising money, jumping through complex hoops every step of the way. As a result, ‘How Long Do I Have Left?’ AI Can Help Answer That Question Next How I Empower the Introverts on My Staff
